title: The 2020 Oscars and ‘The Outsider’ Episode 6 | The Watch
description:
The 2020 Academy Awards deliver a fun, messy, and ultimately feel-good telecast (0:41). Plus: Episode 6 of ‘The Outsider’ showcases everything that makes the show so captivating (41:15).
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
